DESCRIBE.ABOUT: Amazon Echo is a hands-free speaker you control with your voice. Use your Echo to control your {{ value }} just by asking. Follow these steps to get started.
DESCRIBE.HOW_TO: Download the Amazon Alexa app, then go to the 'Skills' section and enable the '{{ value }}' skill. After you enable and link your account, discover your devices.

APP_START.ISSUE_SIGNING_MSG: The username or password you entered may be incorrect. Please check your settings and try again. Or if you have forgotten your password, you can reset it.
APP_START.ISSUE_SIGNING_TITLE: There was an issue signing in

DEVICE_CONTROL_SERVICE.NETWORK_ERROR: There's no network connection. Please check your Wi-Fi or mobile network and try again.
DEVICE_CONTROL_SERVICE.RESPONSE_ERROR: Sorry, there was an issue completing your request. Please check your device and network connection and try again.
DEVICE_CONTROL_SERVICE.TIMEOUT_ERROR: Sorry, your request is taking longer than expected. Please check your network connection or try again.

DEVICE_CREATE.NO_WIFI_LIST: No hotspots found. Please check that your {{ productName }} is on and not currently in use.
DEVICE_CREATE.CONNECT_FAILED_MSG: Please make sure you choose the right SSID.
DEVICE_CREATE.SCAN_FAILED_MSG: Please make sure you enabled the GPS function and allow us to use.
DEVICE_CREATE.AFTER_SETTINGS: Once you've completed this step, come back to the {{ productName }} app to continue the setup.
DEVICE_CREATE.HOW_TO_BEGIN:
To begin you must first connect your phone to the {{ productName }} you are setting up. Your {{ productName }} will broadcast a temporary Wi-Fi hotspot that looks like
"{{ wifiName }}".
DEVICE_CREATE.NOTE: Note: Please turn off cellular/mobile data to proceed with this process.
DEVICE_CREATE.ENABLE_LOCATION_SERVICE_MESSAGE: This app wants to enable location services to find smart home devices in your area.
DEVICE_CREATE.OUT_OF_DATE_TITLE: Your app settings are out of date
DEVICE_CREATE.OUT_OF_DATE_MSG: Please reconnect to a network and update your app settings before continuing to connect your device.
DEVICE_CREATE.NO_WIFI_HOTSPOTS: No hotspots found. Please check that your {{ productName }} is on and not currently in use.

DEVICE_DETAIL.UPDATING_MSG: Your device is updating and will be temporarily unavailable until this process is complete.
DEVICE_DETAIL.OFFLINE_MSG: Your device is not currently online. Please check your device and network settings.

DEVICE_SETTINGS.CHECK_NETWORK_AGAIN: Please check your network settings and try again.
DEVICE_SETTINGS.DELETE_ALERT_TITLE: Are you sure you want to delete {{ deviceName }}?
DEVICE_SETTINGS.GUEST_DELETE_MSG: You will lose all access and need to be reinvited if you wish to use this device.
DEVICE_SETTINGS.HAS_UPDATED: Your device name has been updated.
DEVICE_SETTINGS.IS_NOT_OWNER_NOTE: Note, you will lose all access and need to be reinvited if you wish to use this device
DEVICE_SETTINGS.IS_OWNER_NOTE: Note, as the device owner, removing this device will also remove access for anyone you have invited as a guest. Guests will need to be invited again.
DEVICE_SETTINGS.ISSUE_HAPPENED_WHEN_CHECK_UPDATES: There was an issue checking for updates.
DEVICE_SETTINGS.ISSUE_HAPPENED_WHEN_UPDATE: There was an issue updating your device name. Please try again.
DEVICE_SETTINGS.UP_TO_DATE_MSG: Version <{{ version }}> is currently the newest version available.
DEVICE_SETTINGS.UPDATE_FOUND_MSG: A software update is available for your device. Note that your device will be temporarily inaccessible while the update happens.
DEVICE_SETTINGS.UPDATE_STARTED_MSG: Your device will be temporarily inaccessible while the update happens, and will return to available once the update is complete.

DEVICE_SHARING.ADD_GUEST_MSG: Your {{ familyName }} is ready! To get started, create an account and claim your device here, {{ url }}
DEVICE_SHARING.DELETE_CONFIRM_TITLE: Are you sure you want to remove {{ email }}?
DEVICE_SHARING.ISSUE_HAPPENED_MSG: There was an issue with your request. Please check your settings and try again.
DEVICE_SHARING.LIMIT_REACHED_MSG: Each device can have up to 10 guests at a time. If you would like to add a new guest, please delete another guest first.

FB_LOGIN.ISSUE_HAPPENED_MSG: There was an issue signing you into Facebook. Please check your settings and try again.

FORGOT_PASSWORD.CHECK_SETTINGS: Please check your settings and try again.
FORGOT_PASSWORD.CHK_NETWORK_MSG: Please check your device and network settings and try again.
FORGOT_PASSWORD.CHK_SETTINGS_MSG: Please check your settings and try again.
FORGOT_PASSWORD.ENTER_EMAIL: Please enter your email address to reset your password.
FORGOT_PASSWORD.ISSUE_HAPPENED_TITLE: There was an issue with your request.
FORGOT_PASSWORD.PWD_RESET_MSG: Please check your inbox for an email with instructions to finish resetting your account's password.

GDPR_ALERT.TITLE: "{{ appName }}" Wants to Use "{{ oauthName }}" to Sign in
GDPR_ALERT.MESSAGE: This allows the app and website to share information about you.

DESCRIBE.ABOUT: Google Home is a hands-free speaker you control with your voice. Use your Google Home to control your {{ value }} just by asking. Follow these steps to get started.
DESCRIBE.TEST_SENTENCES:
"Ok Google, turn on <name>"

"Ok Google, turn off <name>"

"Ok Google, set <name> to x percent"
DESCRIBE.HOW_TO: Download the Google Home app, then go to the 'Home Control' section and add a new '{{ value }}'. After you link your account, your device should connect.

GROUP_CONTROL_PANEL.NO_CONTROLS: There are no group controls available because the devices in this group do not share any controls.

GROUP_DETAIL.ERROR_MSG: The devices or group you were viewing are no longer available. Please check your devices and My Groups settings for any recent changes.

DESCRIBE.ABOUT: IFTTT is a free service that helps you do more with all your apps and devices. You can control your {{ value }} automatically with smart triggers and actions. Follow these steps to get started.
DESCRIBE.HOW_TO: Download the IFTTT app, then search for '{{ value }}' and click connect. After you link your account, try adding a premade applet or create your own using actions.

LAST_ERROR.CONNECT_TO_CLOUD_FAIL_CONTENT: There was a temporary connection error. If you can’t connect your device online for several times, please click the link below to send an email to our support team.
LAST_ERROR.CONNECT_TO_CLOUD_FAIL_TITLE: You didn’t connect your device online successfully last time.
LAST_ERROR.CONNECT_TO_INTERNET_FAIL_CONTENT: Your Device was connected to WiFi access point but couldn’t browse the Internet. Please check your network connection or try connecting your device to another internet source and try again.
LAST_ERROR.CONNECT_TO_INTERNET_FAIL_TITLE: You didn’t connect your device online successfully last time.
LAST_ERROR.CONNECT_TO_WIFI_FAIL_CONTENT: Please check your WiFi password or change WiFi settings. If you still can’t connect the device online, please change your WiFi settings to open WiFi and try again.
LAST_ERROR.CONNECT_TO_WIFI_FAIL_TITLE: You didn’t connect your device online successfully last time.
LAST_ERROR.GET_DEVICE_TOKEN_FAIL_CONTENT: There was a temporary connection error. If you can’t connect your device online for several times, please click the link below to send an email to our support team.
LAST_ERROR.GET_DEVICE_TOKEN_FAIL_TITLE: You didn’t connect your device online successfully last time.
LAST_ERROR.TITLE: Last Connection Failure

MY_ACCOUNT.DELETE_MY_ACCOUNT_MESSAGE: Deleting your account is permanent and cannot be undone. Please enter your password to submit a request to delete your account.

MY_ACCOUNT.REQUEST_DATA_TITLE: We've received your request and will send you an email within the appropriate time with instructions to download your data.
MY_ACCOUNT.REQUEST_DATA_EXPIRE_TITLE: You need to wait until {{ date }} to request again.
MY_ACCOUNT.REQUEST_DATA_ERROR: Something went wrong, please contact to support.

MY_GROUPS.DELETE_GROUP_TITLE: Are you sure you want to delete {{ displayName }} ?

OTA_UPDATE_POPUP.NEW_AVAILABLE_MSG: A software update is available for 1 or more of your devices. Please note your devices will be temporarily inaccessible while the update occurs.

PROVISION_FAILURE.CHECK_MSG_1: There is a connection timeout. You can do below action:

PROVISION_FAILURE.CHECK_MSG_6: Otherwise, please click “CHECK DEVICE STATUS” Button.
PROVISION_FAILURE.NO_DEVICE_MSG: Your Wi-Fi network settings may be incorrect or your network connection is experiencing issues. You can check your device status again or go back and reconnect your device.

PROVISION_LOADING.SETTING: Your new {{ productName }} is being set up and checking for the latest updates. During this time, please make sure your app is open and has a network connection.
